pli-tv-kd14:4.3.4: mallaputto yācitabbo → dabbo yācitabbo (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.8: tumhākaṃ kiṃ ahosī”ti → kiṃ nāhosīti (s1-3, km)
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.1: kho mettiyā → sā mettiyā (bj, s1-3, mr)
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.17: tato savātaṃ → tato pavātaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
pli-tv-kd14:5.2.27: Sohaṃ amūḷho → sohaṃ bhante amūḷho (bj, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd14:13.1.4: kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya → kakkhaḷatāya vāḷatāya (s1-3, km); kakkhaḷattāya vālattāya (pts1)
pli-tv-kd14:13.1.8: Tatra ce bhikkhūnaṃ → tatra ce bhikkhave bhikkhūnaṃ (s1-3)
pli-tv-kd14:14.1.1: bhikkhūpi bhikkhūhi vivadanti → etthantare pāṭho sī , syā1-3, kaṃ potthakesu
pli-tv-kd14:14.5.35: Katamo kāyo → katamo ca kāyo (s1-3, km)
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.18: kusalaṃ → idaṃ padaṃ bj, s1-3 potthakesu
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.1: anantāni → anaggāni (bj, pts1) | na cekassa → na cetassa (bj, s1-3, mr)
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.11: Tassa kho, bhikkhave → tassa kho taṃ bhikkhave (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.29: Tassa kho, bhikkhave → tassa kho taṃ bhikkhave (bj, mr); tassa khvetaṃ bhikkhave (s1-3)
